thread.title: For many Venezuelans-it’s migrate or die

title: For many Venezuelans-it’s migrate or die
text:
For many Venezuelans-it’s migrate or die 8:12am EST - 02:12 
More than half a million Venezuelans have flooded into Colombia, many illegally, hoping to escape the grinding poverty and shortages of food and medicine that sank their country into crisis. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
